meanings.definition: A person's name, typically a male's name.
meanings.sent2: Many people know someone named Alecs.
meanings.sent3: When Alecs walked into the room, everyone greeted him cheerfully.
meanings.sent4: In the land of Alecs, everyone shared the same name.
meanings.sent5: The name Alecs is as unique as a rare gem.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the name 'Alec'.
meanings.sent1: We invited the Alecs to our party.
meanings.sent2: The Alecs in our class are all very friendly.
meanings.sent3: The group of Alecs decided to start a band together.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with laughter as the Alecs shared stories.
meanings.sent5: Seeing a gathering of Alecs was like spotting a rare bird in the forest.
